item.title: (728) Unban Command Help!
item.dc:creator: @ic3cr34m ic3cr34m
item.description:
@ic3cr34m wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:12, topic:513025”][quote author=Sup22211 link=topic=631271.msg4274399#msg4274399 date=1364828117]
Is it 100% set to 7? can i see where you set it to 7?
[/quote]
You’re not helping him and neither is my post O.o

OT: Post the command[/quote]

MY command:

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“unban”) && (player.getRights() == 7)) {
try{
String name = “”;
for (int i = 1; i < cmd.length; i++)
name += cmd + ((i == cmd.length - 1) ? “” : " “);
File acc = new File(”./data/characters/"+name+".p");
SerializableFilesManager.loadSerializedFile(acc);
player.setPermBanned(false);
player.setBanned(0);
SerializableFilesManager.storeSerializableClass(pl ayer, acc);
System.out.println(“Succesfully unbanned account.”);
return true;
}catch (Exception e){
player.sm(“Something happened when trying to unban this person.”);
return false;
}
player.sm(“Cannot unban through a command at this moment.”);
}

Read full topic

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“unban”) && (player.getRights() == 7)) {
/* try{

for (int i = 1; i < cmd.length; i++)
name += cmd[i] + ((i == cmd.length - 1) ? “” : " “);

System.out.println(“Succesfully unbanned account.”);
return true;
}catch (Exception e){
player.sm(“Something happened when trying to unban this person.”);
return false;
}*/
